bossDialog: Ahh, more slaves have come to add themselves to my collection. How generous of you to offer up your lives to me!
There's so much I could do once I've ripped your soul out of your body. Care to give me any ideas?
You and your creatures will make fine additions to my army of the undead.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures' {CLASS_Death} spells deal 10% more damage.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures' damaging {CLASS_Death} spells ignore 10% of the enemies' {STAT_defense}.
cardBonuses.8: Your creatures' damaging {CLASS_Death} spells have 10% additional {STAT_charges}.

master.dialog: Liches are powerful spellcasters who use their Death spells to bring decay and rot to all who oppose them. Let's see if you can handle them!
master.name: The Reverend

name: Lich
